column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////To that end
column2: I believe JINYA offers a premium product at a competitive price. And as a small-business owner and self-proclaimed ramen connoisseur
column3: I can tell you a great amount of work goes into (and has gone into) serving a single bowl of JINYA ramen. And for that I will always stand by our product and services. Thank you again for your feedback
column4: and we hope you will visit us again.
